      • inverse

        public double[][] inverse(double[][] source)
        Firstly calculates determinant of the given matrix. Then find the adjoint matrix of the given matrix Finally multiply adjoint matrix with the 1/determinant.
        Parameters:
        source - a mattrix
        Returns:
        inverse of given matrix.
